title: Update Admin Profile
name: UpdateAdminProfile
description: This endpoint allows an admin to update their profile details, such as first name, last name, and phone number.

Parameter.description: The new first name of the admin.
The new last name of the admin.
The new phone number of the admin.

Success 200.description: Indicates whether the request encountered an error.
Success message indicating the profile was updated.

examples.title: Success-Response:

400.description: True if the user is not an admin or the admin was not found.

500.description: True if there was a server error.

Error 4xx.description: Error message explaining the failure reason.

title: Check In
name: CheckIn
description: Allows a teacher to check in at the school if they are within a 5km radius. If they have already checked in today, they will not be allowed to check in again.

Parameter.description: The current location of the teacher in the format [longitude, latitude].

Success 200.description: The check-in object containing details of the check-in.

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: The teacher was not found in the system.
The school associated with the teacher was not found.
The teacher is outside the 5km radius from the school.
The teacher has already checked in today.

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:

Header.description: Bearer token for admin or teacher access.

Parameter.description: The ID of the class for which absent students are being retrieved.
The date for which the attendance is checked (in ISO format).
The ID of the class for which students are being retrieved.

Success 200.description: Indicates whether there was an error (false for success).
Array of students in the specified class.

400.description: The reason for the error (e.g., "You are not teacher", "you are not assigned to this class").

Parameter.description: The ID of the student for whom the attendance percentage is being requested.

404.description: Error message for not found student or class.

title: Get Teacher Check-in Records
name: GetTeacherCheckIns
description: This endpoint returns the check-in attendance records of a teacher, showing which days they were present or absent.

Success 200.description: Indicates if the operation was successful (false for success).
Array of attendance records for the teacher.
Whether the teacher was present on that date.
The exact check-in time if the teacher was present, null otherwise.

Error 4xx.description: Indicates if the operation was successful (true for failure).
Description of the error that occurred.

examples.title: Error-Response:

Parameter.description: The ID of the class for which attendance is being marked.
The ID of the student whose attendance is being marked.

400.description: The reason for the error (e.g., "You are not a teacher", "You are not assigned to this class", "Student is not assigned to this class").

title: Update Attendance
name: UpdateAttendance
description: Allows both teachers and admins to update attendance for a class. The update can be for the current day or a previous day. The action can either add a student to the present list or remove them.

Parameter.description: The ID of the student whose attendance is being updated.
The action to perform, either "add" (to mark as present) or "remove" (to mark as absent).
The date for which attendance is being updated (optional, defaults to today).

Success 200.description: Indicates whether there was an error (false means success).
The success message describing the action performed.

examples.title: Success Response:

Error 4xx.description: Indicates whether there was an error (true means failure).
A description of the error that occurred.

examples.title: Error Response (Student Not Assigned):
Error Response (Unauthorized User):

403.description: Error message for not being a student.

404.description: Message indicating no attendance records were found.

Parameter.description: User's email address (optional, required if username is not provided).
User's username (optional, required if email is not provided).

title: Get Class by ID
name: GetClassById
description: This endpoint retrieves a class by its ID. Only authenticated users who belong to the same school can access this resource.

Parameter.description: The unique identifier of the class to retrieve (passed as a URL parameter).

Success 200.description: Total number of students in the class.

404.description: Error message stating that the class was not found.

Parameter.description: URL Param The _id of the Schedule to delete
URL Param The _id of the Schedule to edit
URL Param The _id of the Schedule to find

title: Create a new school with Stripe account
name: CreateSchool
description: Creates a new school in the system and sets up a Stripe account for payment processing.

Parameter.description: Type of the location, always set to "Point".
Longitude and latitude of the school as an array.

Header.description: URL Param The _id of the School to edit
Stripe account ID created for the school.

201.description: Whether the school is active or not.

The reason for the error (e.g., "you are not admin", "school not found").

title: Get All Teachers
name: GetAllTeachers
description: Retrieves all teachers belonging to the school

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "error": false,
  "message": "Teachers retrieved successfully.",
  "data": [
    {
      "_id": "614d1b6f8f8b9e001cb12345",
      "firstName": "John",
      "lastName": "Doe",
      "email": "john.doe@example.com",
      "phone": "1234567890",
      "gender": "Male",
      "_school": "614c1b6f8f8b9e001cb12345",
      "isActive": true
    },
    {
      "_id": "614d1b6f8f8b9e001cb12346",
      "firstName": "Jane",
      "lastName": "Smith",
      "email": "jane.smith@example.com",
      "phone": "0987654321",
      "gender": "Female",
      "_school": "614c1b6f8f8b9e001cb12345",
      "isActive": true
    }
  ]
}

Error 4xx.description: Indicates if there was an error (true if failed).
Error message explaining the reason.
